import axios from 'axios' import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import RecipesContext from '../ourContext' const AddRJ = () => { const listrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).listrecipe const setlistrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).setlistrecipe const login=useContext(RecipesContext).login const add=()=>{ let y=listrecipe axios.put('http://localhost:1234/Recipes/addRecipe',y).then(l=>{setlistrecipe(l.data)},alert("Added successfully")) } return (
{login==null?
you dont login to the site, you can't add recipe
:
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,name:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,description:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,pic:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,level:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,duration:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,type:e.target.value})}> setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,id:e.target.value})}> setmyrecipe({...listrecipe,component:e.target.value})}> add()}>
}
) } export default AddRJ
